comments: This sequence is a part of a class of sequences of the type: a(n) = sum(i=0,n,(C^i)*(i^k)). This sequence has C=2, k=2. Sequence A036799 has C=2, k=1. Suppose C>=2, k>=1 are integers. What is the general closed form for a(n)? - _Ctibor O. Zizka_, Feb 07 2008
references: M. Petkovsek et al., A=B, Peters, 1996, p. 97.
Jolley, Summation of Series, Dover (1961), p. 6.
